recommendations: Shailja Gahlot “I highly recommend Aamir as a Business Analyst/Consultant in the insurance claims division. He possesses excellent technical expertise and strong communication skills. Aamir has consistently demonstrated exceptional data analysis abilities, identifying patterns and providing valuable insights. He effectively bridged the gap between technical teams and stakeholders, conveying complex concepts with clarity. Aamir’s attention to detail ensured data integrity, and his interpersonal skills fostered collaboration.”

Tushar Parashar “I had the pleasure of working with Aamir as a business analyst at EXL. Aamir is a highly skilled and detail-oriented individual with a passion for data analysis. Aamir has a strong understanding of data analytics tools and techniques and was able to provide valuable insights and recommendations that helped improve the company's decision-making process. He is a quick learner and was able to efficiently handle complex projects, including the analysis of large datasets and the creation of reports for stakeholders. He was able to communicate the findings of the data in an easy-to-understand manner and was always willing to go the extra mile to ensure the success of the project. He has the skills and experience necessary to succeed in this field and would be a valuable asset to any team.”
